description:
Kenichi is only referred as "Male Staff Member" in the dub, is one of George Charino`s many producers. He is based off Pokénchi host Kenichi Maeyamada, better known as Hyadain.
During Pokénchi episode #176, a segment of the show was dedicated to the recording session of this character featuring Hyadain, Rinka Otani, Director Daiki Tomiyasu and Sound Director Masafumi Mima.
name: Ken`ichi
